title: Visual bug

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: So I was playing garen with normal ms about 50ms. Later I start spiking and get to 60-90ms and then Garen just turned out like this underground for me and it was very distracting for me the entire game.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Wow, that's definitely quite odd.

Has this occurred since?
Hmm no, but in the game I am experiencing random lags not from fps or ms where sometimes minions or characters are teleporting a bit. And it occurs randomly once a while.

Could you do the following for me to help better determine the nature of your issues,

* [Switch to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5)
* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the direct url to your ICSI netalyzr results.

My apologies for not getting to this sooner, I've been rather ill this past week.

From that screenshot I can definitely see some packet loss along your route, have you tried contacting your ISP?

Also, were you unable to run the ICSI netalyzr test?
Well in a while my internet will upgrade to fibre so that is fine, and the ICIS test didn't run
